name: Hyperkill - A ZX Spectrum game
description:
Hyperkill is a blast em up in the style of Cybernoid spanning a whopping 44 rooms. The aim of Hyperkill is to get through the base to reactivate the security systems, clearing up all the enemy scum along the way. Power ups will help such as shield top ups, extra lives and the mighty spinner!!

Normal up down left right and fire to steer and shoot and holding fire drops grenades which help clearing both enemy and blockages.

Two version to pick from ZXOKP and QAOPM

Pressing H pauses the game, fire restarts.

This is the updated version with the music bug fixed.

Music by Sergey Kosov
